teammembers.name: John McGee
teammembers.description: Simply incredible. If I could rate him higher I would. Neal was incredibly professional throughout the whole process!

teammembers.name: Norman Foreman
teammembers.description: I'm definitely working with Neal again. He took my daughters prom pictures and they were incredible.

teammembers.name: Jennete VonLeslie
teammembers.description: Not just a great photographer, but also a great human being.
